channel.title: Need help with an error " cannot find symbol "

item.title: Need help with an error " cannot find symbol "
item.dc:creator: @pk_blooder pk_blooder
item.description:
@pk_blooder wrote:

i wanted to add sum kinda clan war system but it says “cannot find symbol” while compiling in the commands part, i got this

public static int Clanwar = 0;

i got this in the beginning on line 11

this boolean

public boolean ClanFight() {
    if(Clanwar == 1){
	return false;
    }
    return true;
}[/code]


and here i get the errors in commands..
[code]    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("clanwaroff") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pk blooder")) {

	try {
	    if(ClanFight()) {
		ClanWar = 1;
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "all people who want a clan war get ur clan cape";
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "go with you clan war emote to the clan place";
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "if your not in a clan yet type ::joinclan bloodpkers OR";
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "::joinclan Damage Inc OR ::joinclan name of third clan";
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("u are already organising a clanwar");
	}
    }
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("clanwaron") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pk blooder")) {

	try {
	    if(ClanFight() == false) {
		ClanWar = 0;
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "the clan war has begun u can attack eachother now!";
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
	    sendMessage("people can already attack eachother");
	}
    }

i get errors at ClanWar = 1; and ClanWar = 0;
can anyone help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 09:07:28 AM[/size][hr]help me ffs i tryed 4 hours on this and it still doesnt work :s

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with an error " cannot find symbol "
